title: Download past matric exam papers for free here
text:
Download past matric exam papers for free here

Here's a list of all the matric subject pages where you can find past NSC matric exam papers dating from 2008, as well as IEB past papers, to download for free and practise on.

Welcome, Matrics 2019!

Here are old NSC exam papers from 2008 to February 2018 you can use to practise, courtesy of the Department of Basic Education.

Simply choose the subject and click on the coloured blocks, sorted by Languages and Non-Languages.



Languages:

English

Afrikaans

isiNdebele





isiXhosa

isiZulu

Sepedi

Sesotho

Setswana

Siswati

Tshivenda

Xitsonga

Non-languages:

Business

Agriculture

Maths & Science

Technology

Humanities

Arts

Hospitality & Tourism

Have we missed anything? What other kinds of resources can we add to Parent24? If you find any inaccuracies or have suggestions, please let us know at learn@parent24.com. Kindly note that we cannot respond to individual emails requesting that we email these papers.
description: Here's a list of all the matric subject pages where you can find past NSC matric exam papers dating from 2008, as well as IEB past papers, to download for free and practise on.
